{"id":494330972,"lang":"javascript","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1621236740,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"152 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/494330972/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"56.6 MB","code":"/**\n * @param {string} s\n * @return {string}\n */\nvar reverseVowels = function(s) {\n    const strToArr = s.split('');\n    const vowels = [];\n    for(letter in strToArr){\n      if((/^[aeiou]$/i).test(strToArr[letter])){\n        vowels.push(strToArr[letter])\n      }\n    }\n    const reversedVowel = reverseArray(vowels);\n\n    let idx = 0;\n    for(letter in strToArr){\n      if((/^[aeiou]$/i).test(strToArr[letter])){\n        strToArr[letter] = reversedVowel[idx++]\n      }\n    }\n    return strToArr.join('')\n};\n\nfunction reverseArray(arr){\n  let left = 0;\n  let right = arr.length - 1;\n  while(left < right){\n    const temp = arr[left];\n    arr[left] = arr[right];\n    arr[right] = temp;\n    left++;\n    right--;\n  }\n  return arr;\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string"}
